snippet: Security researchers at Kaspersky Lab wrote in a blog post that they have been unsuccessful in trying to crack the encryption code of Gauss, a computer virus targeting computers in Lebanon.
abstract: Security researchers at Kaspersky Lab wrote in a blog post that they have been unsuccessful in trying to crack the encryption code of Gauss, a computer virus targeting computers in Lebanon.

headline.main: Unable to Crack Computer Virus, Security Firm Seeks Help
